quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: First Shanghai Investments Ltd is an investment holding company principally engaged in financial services and property development and investment. The Company operates its business through five segments. The Financial Services segment includes securities investment, securities broking, margin financing, corporate finance, underwriting and placements and asset management. The Property Development segment engages in the development of residential, service apartment, commercial office, industrial office, hotel and recreation resort properties. The Property Investment and Hotel segment includes hotel operation and management. The Medical and Healthcare segment engages in the provision of general and specialist consultation, imaging, endoscopy and day surgery, body check and medic beauty services. The Direct Investment segment involves in the investment in pharmaceutical and health care, telecommunication and logistic industries.
